title: How to Make Party Favors Using Take Out Boxes

steps.headline: Select suitable take-out boxes.
steps.description: You can often find variously sized take-out containers in craft stores, but if not, check your local restaurant supplier. Select the size according to the favors you're adding.

steps.headline: Stuff the inside of the box with tissue paper, raffia, cellophane strips or even fabric (especially if it's a scarf or similar favor that you're giving away).
Add the party favors to the box.
steps.description: Suitable items include candies, chocolates, toys, decorations, gift vouchers or music download cards, etc. Theme the favor with your party––for example, if it's a tea party, put in a selection of teabags, teaspoon and a teabag holder.

steps.headline: Tie the box together with a colorful bow.
steps.description: Use wide ribbon, such as organza or grosgrain in colors and patterns that match your event.

steps.headline: Stack the transformed party favor boxes on a cake stand or similar display item near the door, so that guests can help themselves or you can simply hand them out, as they leave.

text: Select suitable take-out boxes. You can often find variously sized take-out containers in craft stores, but if not, check your local restaurant supplier. Select the size according to the favors you're adding. Stuff the inside of the box with tissue paper, raffia, cellophane strips or even fabric (especially if it's a scarf or similar favor that you're giving away).  Add the party favors to the box. Suitable items include candies, chocolates, toys, decorations, gift vouchers or music download cards, etc. Theme the favor with your party––for example, if it's a tea party, put in a selection of teabags, teaspoon and a teabag holder. Tie the box together with a colorful bow. Use wide ribbon, such as organza or grosgrain in colors and patterns that match your event. Stack the transformed party favor boxes on a cake stand or similar display item near the door, so that guests can help themselves or you can simply hand them out, as they leave.
